allscreens.description: System works flawlessly on all signage displays whether lobby or elevator screens. Also, we have android app for portable entertainment displays such as the ones in taxis, buses, etc.
realtimesync.description: to manage content of your all your screens from one place with a click of a button, and you can do that from phone, tablet, or personal pc
queuesys.description: If you are a business that need a queue system, we've got the right solution for you. Our queue system is embeded next to your content so your visitors know when it is their turn to be served.
aws.description: we use the best storage infrastructure on the planet to ensure that your files are stored safely and properly
unlimitedscreens.description: with small fee, you can create as many screens as you can to show your customers the content you want
ondemand.description: Whatever you need, whether it is on premise installation or custom addons on the system, just contact us and we'll be happy to help
